ch.thomasmueller.saltyfiles.transformer
Class Transformer

java.lang.Object
  ch.thomasmueller.saltyfiles.transformer.Transformer
public class Transformer
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to transform the data form encrypted to decrypted or vice versa. PBEWithMD5AndDES is used as algorithm.

Author:
Thomas Mueller

transform

public void transform(int aMode,
                      InputFileHandler source,
                      OutputFileHandler target)
               throws java.lang.Exception
Starts transformation an show an animation while transforming. The file signature (first for bytes) will not be transformed.

Parameters:
aMode - either Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE or Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE
source - the source archive
target - the target archive
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
